pages.title: Reaching Level 45
pages.text: To reach level 45, you'll want to create some $(9)Hellshelves$(), and add them to your existing Bookshelves.

pages.title: Reaching Level 45
pages.text: If you aren't fond of the Nether, you can also venture to the Ocean, and create $(9)Seashelves$() instead.

pages.title: Reaching Level 60
pages.text: Once you reach Level 45, you'll need to explore $(l:apotheosis:enchanting/table/infusion)Infusion Enchanting$() to upgrade your shelves.

pages.title: Reaching Level 60
pages.text: Create a few more of the type of shelf you were using, infuse them, and upgrade them.$(p)These new shelves, on top of your old ones, will let you reach Level 60.

pages.title: Other Stats
pages.text: You now have access to better options for increasing other stats.$(p)On top of the bonuses from Hellshelves and Seashelves, you may now also create $(9)Sightshelves$() to increase your $(clues).

pages.title: Other Stats
pages.text: If you have a stable supply of Amethyst, you can also make $(9)Rectifiers$() to further increase your $(rectification).
